content: crafty intentions free crochet pattern beaded möbius strip fidget printable pdf-file / 39 pages developed by megan lapp aka crafty intentions this pattern is for beaded möbius strip fidgets this pattern is written in u s terminology this pattern comes with instructions to make beaded möbius strip fidget the pattern comes with instructions for three sizes of fidget - small 2x2 inches medium 3x3 inches and large 4x4 inches it comes with 2 beading options - lightly beaded or heavily beaded and it comes with an explanation for how to attach the beads in three different ways embedding one bead placing 1 bead on top of the work or attaching 2 beads at a time on both and the front and back of the work everything you see in the photos is included in the pattern all instructions are carefully depicted with words and photos this pattern features clear step by step instruction with a lot of row-by-row photos the gauge is not crucial to the pattern as long as the stitches are tight enough to hold stuffing this pattern is a total of 39 pages containing a full set of written instructions with photographic illustrations and there are video tutorials for particular steps and stitches available on my youtube channel this pattern consists of one pdf file and the last 10 pages include 7 pages of text-only printer-friendly instructions and 3 pages of the eu safety and compliance document but i strongly recommend you still refer to the photographic illustrations throughout the pattern if you have any questions this pattern is available in english size a small möbius strip fidget from this pattern is approximately 2 x 2 inches a medium möbius strip fidget is approximately 3 x 3 inches a large möbius strip fidget is approximately 4 x 4 inches … … … … … … … … … … … … … supply list yarn in worsted weight all amounts are approximate this pattern requires a yardage range of 20 to 50 yards of worsted/medium/4 weight yarn depending on the options used small möbius strip fidget approximately 20 yards medium/worsted/4 weight yarn medium möbius strip fidget approximately 30 yards medium/worsted/4 weight yarn large möbius strip fidget approximately 40 -
